title: Video Highlight Extractor
author: Akshay Patel
description:
Video highlight extraction is the process of identifying and isolating key moments or segments from a longer video. This technique is commonly used in various fields such as sports, entertainment, and surveillance. Video highlight extraction enhances content consumption by providing viewers with quick access to the most engaging parts of a video, saving time and improving user experience.

Note:- You need to pass below environment variables to run 
STT_SERVICE_URL
API_KEY_S2T
IBM_CLOUD_API_KEY
IBM_CLOUD_URL
PROJECT_ID

installDependencyCommands: pip install pandas ibm_watson_machine_learning python-dotenv ibm_cloud_sdk_core ibm_watson seaborn matplotlib joblib tqdm numpy
